mapper.update: update jrs_pc_adv set adv_img = #{advImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, show_start_time = #{showStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, show_end_time = #{showEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, jump_url = #{jumpUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_status = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifiy_user_id = #{modifiyUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modifiy_time = #{modifiyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, adv_img, show_start_time, show_end_time, jump_url, delete_status, create_user_id, create_time, modifiy_user_id, modifiy_time from jrs_pc_adv where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
